channel.title: William Stanley Merwin on DuyKa's Blog

item.title: Hành trình dưới mưa (Rain travel)
item.description: Rain travel Tác giả: William Stanley Merwin (Mỹ) I wake in the dark and remember it is the morning when I must start by myself on the journey I lie listening to the black hour before dawn and you are still asleep beside me while around us the trees full of night lean hushed in their dream that bears us up asleep and awake then I hear drops falling one by one into
